sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Jacks is a similar minor character. He is one of the guards who accompanyÂ [[Eddard Stark]] to [[King's Landing]]. He is one of the few survivors of the massacre of the Stark household after Ned's arrest. He is later released to accompany Eddard's remains north.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He alerts [[Catelyn Stark]] to the recapture of Ser [[Jaime Lannister]], clashing with her sworn sword [[Brienne]] over entering her tent unannounced. He then accompanies Catelyn as she confronts Lord [[Rickard Karstark]] and convinces him to await the return of King [[Robb Stark]] for justice for Jaime's murder of [[Torrhen Karstark]].<ref>"[[A Man Without Honor]]"</ref>
